divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my ex-girlfriend were headed to L.A from Texas on I-10 somewhere between ( New Mexico and Arizona, what looked like a comit or big shooting star shot across The sky in front of us while I was driving, from left to right, at that time my radar detector sounded off as if we were passing a cop with his radar gun on, you know how the beeps start slowly and as you get closer to the cop th e beeps start beeping closer together, well the second we saw the the light the radar went off and it left a trail of light in the sky at a 90 degree angle and the was gone. We were very energetic and excited after we saw that.
Summary: comit, 90 dgree angle in sky, tracer of light, radar detector sounded rapid
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around January 15th 1995
